RawLine: SDM_3101807701,哎呀！{color=#cc0000}杜建{/color}跟{color=#cc0000}龐大娘{/color}又鬧翻了，這事非得由你來幫忙調解……,哎呀！{color=#cc0000}杜建{/color}跟{color=#cc0000}庞大娘{/color}又闹翻了，这事非得由你来帮忙调解……

Items.mt: Oops! Du Jian and Pang Da Niang fell out again, this matter must be mediated by your help ......
